name: Architecture Design
description: Companies that provide architectural design services, creating conceptual and detailed designs for buildings, spaces, and environments.

name: Interior Design
description: Firms that specialize in designing interior spaces, including layout, materials, and aesthetics, to enhance functionality and user experience.

name: Urban Planning
description: Companies that develop and implement plans for urban spaces, including transportation systems, public spaces, and community development.

name: Landscape Architecture
description: Design firms that focus on outdoor spaces, including parks, gardens, and other landscapes, to create functional and aesthetically pleasing environments.

name: Building Information Modeling (BIM)
description: Companies that provide BIM services, creating digital models of buildings and infrastructure to enhance design, construction, and operation efficiency.

name: Sustainable Design
description: Firms that specialize in designing buildings and spaces that minimize environmental impact, reduce energy consumption, and promote eco-friendliness.

name: Acoustic Design
description: Companies that design and optimize acoustic environments, including soundproofing, noise reduction, and audio system design.

name: Lighting Design
description: Firms that specialize in designing lighting systems, including natural and artificial light, to enhance ambiance, functionality, and energy efficiency.

name: Exhibition Design
description: Companies that design and build exhibitions, trade shows, and events, including display systems, graphics, and interactive experiences.

name: Product Design
description: Firms that design and develop products, including furniture, fixtures, and equipment, for the architecture and design industry.

name: Design Technology
description: Companies that provide design technology solutions, including software, hardware, and consulting services, to enhance design efficiency and productivity.

name: Construction Documentation
description: Firms that provide construction documentation services, including drawing, specification, and permitting, to support the design-to-build process.

name: Design Consulting
description: Companies that offer design consulting services, including strategy, innovation, and design thinking, to help organizations improve their design capabilities.
